name: Vegan Farmer
description: The cow farmer’s daughter is a vegan now! You set out to create a delicious avocado salad for her. The problem: there is nothing but cows. Use your clever crafting skills to let all those fancy vegetables appear: green leaf lettuce, tomatoes, sweet corn, even avocado! The game is played by just dragging and combining things with the mouse. Do you have what it takes? Let’s find out!
